title: Electronic and adsorption properties of halogen molecule X<sub>2</sub> (X=F, Cl) adsorbed arsenene: First-principles study
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Muhammad Mateen, Muhammad Mushtaq, Abdelazim M. Mebed, Hanan A. Althobaiti, Amel Laref, Niaz Ali Khan, Sidra Tul Muntaha, Samah Al-Qaisi, Ghulam Abbas Ashraf
